Style/FetchEnvVar.description:
Description

Suggests `ENV.fetch` for the replacement of `ENV[]`.
Style/FetchEnvVar.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

References: ['https://rubystyle.guide/#hash-fetch-defaults'] (type: list)
AllowedVars: [] (type: list)
DefaultToNil: True (type: bool)
